title: Mac Client Problem
body: I logged on today to play a ranked game, and as the champion select countdown ended, the game should have opened up another application that shows the loading screen and then the game. _Yet, what happened was the application opened, and then had a full pure white screen. After maybe like 3 minutes the loading screen showed up with no one connected, then said I had connection issues. I did not, because my brother(who was playing at the same time) did not have this issue. So I quit the loading screen and tried to reconnect._ The same thing happened, except this time the white screen wouldn't load into anything, and it made my Mac not respond making me have to shut it down, and never enter my ranked game. I am in the process of e-downloading the client. **Anyone else experiencing this by any chance?**

replies.body: Even though another PC might be able to use the net fine, or even yourself, it doesn't make you immune from reaching specific services.  These blank screens can happen if your network fails to download assets, further affirmed by failing to reach the game server.  Your best bet is to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up and back into game.  Let me know if that clears things up!
